on American chairs as the S&P 500

we're already in a recession because

well the Trump bump has been the biggest

uneasiness

it will also undercut prospects for

he's not even going to come close

and tomorrow March 15th we have the debt

because they thought Hillary Clinton

well it kind of disappeared they spent
all the money the daily Treasury
statements from March 7th the cash
balance was down to 88 billion meaning
347 billion of cash has flown out the

and on March 8th alone the Treasury

bringing the balance down to 66 billion
during that 47 day period the Treasury
took the opportunity to pay down fifty
seven billion of maturing Treasury bills
and notes by tapping its cash hoard they
drained the 294 billion from the bank
account of the Treasury or about 6.4
billion per day and here we are at March

out of cash by Memorial Day that means
they'll not even be a glimmer of hope
for any type of tax stimulus economic

to raise the debt ceiling or the country

do they kick the can down the street and

we need to default what is happening now

we just can't go on we know tax receipts
